title: Customer Support Executive (International)// Sutherland // Navi Mumbai

ambitionBoxData.Title: Sutherland Global Services Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Job description


Dear Connections,


Greetings from Sutherland,


"This exciting opportunity is based in our Mumbai office. To ensure seamless collaboration, candidates residing within a designated travel boundary will be considered.


|| Urgent Hiring for Ecommerce and Telecommunications Process ||


* Sutherland is hiring for International Voice Process (customer service).


*Shift Timings: 5 Days working with 24*7 Rotational Shifts and 2 Rotational Off.


*Salary: 18000 to 30000


*HSC or Graduate freshers can apply.


*1 year of international BPO experience can also apply.


*Immediate Joiners can apply


*Need experience in International Bpo of minimum 1 year on paper


*Location: Airoli


* Are you passionate about exceeding customer expectations? Do you thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment? Sutherland Global Services is seeking a motivated individual to join our International Process team as a Voice Customer Support Specialist!


* Why Sutherland?
Make a Global Impact: Provide exceptional support to customers worldwide, ensuring a positive brand experience.
Fast-Paced & Rewarding: Thrive in a dynamic environment with opportunities for growth and lucrative incentives.
Supportive Team Culture: Work collaboratively with a team dedicated to providing excellent customer service.


*The Role:
As a Customer Support Specialist, you'll be the voice of Sutherland, resolving customer inquiries and ensuring their satisfaction.


*Be a Communication Master:
Utilize your excellent English communication skills to effectively interact with customers over various channels.
Problem-Solving Pro: Analyze and resolve customer queries efficiently, exceeding expectations at every touchpoint.
Embrace Flexibility: Work within a rotational schedule, including night shifts, to provide 24/7 exceptional service.


*Who You Are:
A passionate and articulate individual with a genuine desire to help others.
You thrive in a fast-paced environment and possess excellent problem-solving skills.
Strong computer literacy and basic Microsoft Office/Excel proficiency will be great.
A team player who enjoys collaborating with colleagues to achieve shared goals.


*Bonus Points:
Experience with customer service or technical support in voice will be an added advantage.
Ability to work independently and demonstrate a strong work ethic and manage performance KPIs.


*Benefits Package:
Robust benefits package/ net salary + lucrative incentives + Travel Allowance + Quarterly incentives + Overtime Bonus (Subject to different departments).
Comprehensive medical insurance + Accident insurance.


*Location:
Within Central line [Sion to Dombivali] & Harbour line [Wadala to Panvel]. Some specified railway stations have a cut off of 1.5 kilometers Panvel, Kalyan and Dadar station.

Remote work is not currently available for this position. Only candidates residing within the designated travel boundaries can apply.


*Address:
5th Floor, Liberty Tower, Kalwa Industrial Area Thane Belapur Road, Airoli, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 400708.


*Email your Cv At
HR. Mahi: 9136559570 / Mehjbin.khan2@sutherlandglobal.com


Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresher

Pay: 18,000.00 - 30,000.00 per month


Benefits:

  • Health insurance
  • Paid sick time
  • Paid time off
  • Provident Fund

Schedule:

  • Evening shift
  • Night shift
  • Rotational shift
  • UK shift
  • US shift

Supplemental pay types:

  • Overtime pay
  • Performance bonus
  • Quarterly bonus
  • Shift allowance

Education:

  • Higher Secondary(12th Pass) (Preferred)

Experience:

  • total work: 1 year (Required)
  • International voice process: 1 year (Preferred)

Language:

  • English (Preferred)

Shift availability:

  • Night Shift (Required)

Work Location: Airoli

title: Junior Android App Developer
jobDescription:
As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining Android applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to create high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications that meet the needs of our users and clients. Your role will involve coding, debugging, and optimizing Android apps while staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Design and develop native Android applications from scratch or enhance existing ones to deliver outstanding user experiences.
  • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code, and troubleshoot and resolve bugs to ensure the apps stability and reliability.
  • Work closely with UX/UI designers to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that align with design guidelines.
  • Integrate with web services, APIs, and third-party libraries to fetch and send data securely.
  • Optimize the apps performance, responsiveness, and resource utilization to ensure smooth user interactions and minimal battery consumption.
  • Use version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage code changes and collaborate effectively with team members.
  • Write unit tests, conduct manual testing, and collaborate with quality assurance teams to ensure the application functions correctly across various devices and Android versions.
  • Implement security best practices, including data encryption, authentication, and authorization, to protect user data and maintain compliance with privacy regulations.
  • Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation for code, APIs, and project-related information to facilitate knowledge sharing and future development.
  • Stay updated with the latest Android development trends, tools, and technologies, and share your knowledge with the team.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, backend developers, and quality assurance engineers, to deliver high-quality products on time.
Qualifications:
  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
  • Proven experience as an Android Developer with a portfolio of completed Android apps.
  • Strong knowledge of Java or Kotlin programming languages.
  • Proficiency in Android Studio and related development tools.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs, JSON, and web services integration.
  • Experience with version control systems, particularly Git.
  • Understanding of design principles, UI/UX guidelines, and Material Design.
  • Knowledge of mobile app architecture patterns (e.g., MVVM, MVP).
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Ability to work independently and in a team, as well as excellent communication skills.
  • A passion for staying updated with the latest trends in mobile app development.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience with cross-platform development frameworks (e.g., Flutter, React Native).
  • Knowledge of Android Jetpack components and libraries.
  • Familiarity with cloud services (e.g., Firebase, AWS) for app development.
  • Understanding of mobile security best practices.
  • Contributions to open-source Android projects or active participation in the Android developer community.
  • Benefit from invaluable mentorship provided by seasoned leaders.
  • Enjoy a vibrant atmosphere enriched with engaging games and activities.
  • Receive quarterly rewards as a token of recognition for your valuable contributions.
  • Immerse yourself in a creative and open culture that fosters innovation.
  • Full-time / Freelance / Part-time / Contract
  • A minimum duration of 6 months is mandatory.
  • In case of no prior experience, you have the option to apply for an internship.

title: Freelance Junior Windows 10 App Developer
jobDescription:
• As a Windows 11 App Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining applications that run on the Windows 11 operating system
  • You will work closely with a team of developers and collaborate with designers and product managers to create high-quality, user-friendly, and innovative applications that leverage the capabilities of Windows 11
  • Your role will involve coding, debugging, testing, and optimizing applications to ensure they meet performance and usability standards
Key Responsibilities:
  • Design and develop Windows 11 applications using modern programming languages, such as C#, .NET, and XAML.
  • Create user interfaces that adhere to Windows 11 design guidelines and provide an exceptional user experience.
  • Collaborate with team members to review and improve code quality, performance, and maintainability.
  • Identify and resolve bugs, bottlenecks, and other technical issues in the codebase.
  • Ensure that applications are compatible with various Windows 11 devices, including desktops, laptops, tablets, and 2-in-1 devices.
  • Consider responsive design principles for different screen sizes and resolutions.
  • Integrate with Windows 11 features and APIs, such as Live Tiles, Notifications, Cortana, and Windows Ink, to enhance the functionality of your apps.
  • Utilize cloud services and third-party APIs when necessary.
  • Implement security best practices to protect user data and the integrity of the application.
  • Ensure compliance with Windows Store and Microsofts security guidelines.
  • Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing and UI testing, to identify and fix issues.
  • Collaborate with quality assurance teams to ensure high-quality app releases.
  • Create and maintain documentation for code, APIs, and application architecture.
  • Provide technical documentation to assist in onboarding new team members.
  • Stay updated with the latest Windows 11 updates, technologies, and best practices.
  • Attend workshops, conferences, and training to enhance your skills and knowledge.
Qualifications:
  • Bachelors or higher degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as C#, .NET, and XAML.
  • Experience with Windows 11 app development or prior experience with Windows 10 app development.
  • Familiarity with the Windows 11 design guidelines and user interface principles.
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Knowledge of software development best practices, including version control, code reviews, and testing.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate effectively.
  • Experience with tools and technologies commonly used in Windows app development, such as Visual Studio, Windows App SDK, and Windows Store submissions.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience with Universal Windows Platform (UWP) development.
  • Familiarity with cloud services and backend development for Windows apps.
  • Knowledge of Microsoft Azure and DevOps tools.
  • Experience with agile development methodologies.
  • Published Windows 11 apps on the Microsoft Store.
Benefits:
  • Benefit from invaluable mentorship provided by seasoned leaders.
  • Enjoy a vibrant atmosphere enriched with engaging games and activities.
  • Receive quarterly rewards as a token of recognition for your valuable contributions.
  • Immerse yourself in a creative and open culture that fosters innovation.
Job Type:
  • Full-time / Freelance / Part-time / Contract
Experience:
  • A minimum duration of 6 months is mandatory.
  • In case of no prior experience, you have the option to apply for an internship.

title: Android App Developer
jobDescription:
Creatorstechnology is looking for Android App Developer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • As an Android App Developer, your primary responsibility will be to design, develop, and maintain Android applications
  • You will collaborate with a team of designers, product managers, and other developers to create user-friendly and innovative mobile applications that meet the needs of our users
  • Your role will involve the following:App Development: Develop high-quality, reliable, and scalable Android applications using Java or Kotlin programming languages
  • Ensure that the applications are optimized for performance, security, and usability
  • Code and Debug: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while adhering to best practices and coding standards
  • Debug and resolve any issues or bugs that arise during the development and testing phases
  • UI/UX Implementation: Collaborate with designers to implement engaging user interfaces and intuitive user experiences
  • Ensure that the app's design elements are consistent with the overall visual brand and usability guidelines
  • API Integration: Integrate with back-end services, APIs, and external data sources to fetch and update data in the application
  • Work closely with the backend development team to define API requirements and establish efficient communication protocols
  • Testing and Deployment: Conduct thorough testing of the application to identify and fix any defects or performance issues
  • Collaborate with quality assurance (QA) team members to ensure high-quality deliverables
  • Deploy applications to the Google Play Store and manage the release process
  • Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and backend developers, to gather requirements, define project scope, and deliver projects on time
  • Continuous Learning: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in Android app development, mobile technologies, and industry best practices
  • Share knowledge and insights with the team to foster a culture of continuous learning and improvement
